Title: Task Encoding across the Multiple Demand Cortex Is Consistent with a Frontoparietal and Cingulo-OpercularDual Networks Distinction
Task.variable.decoded: decoded which rule subjects were using. There were 4 rules and thus 15 pairwise comparisons. The rules were perceptual (judge object's hieght, shape), semantic (is this animal a mammal), or lexical (is this a word). Classification was done on several ROI's. The within rule classifications were much harder.
Region.name: lDLPFC
